property.content:
{{velocity}} #macro(customSplit $fullName $names) #set($flag = false) #set($names = []) #set($name = '') #foreach($s in $fullName.split('')) #if($flag) #set($name = $name + $s) #set($flag = false) #else #if($s.equals('\')) #set($flag = true) #elseif($s.equals('.')) #set($dis = $names.add($name)) #set($name = '') #set($flag = false) #else #set($name = $name + $s) #set($flag = false) #end #end #end #set($dis = $names.add($name)) #end #macro(getOrgOrPro $names $i $spaceName) #if($i >= 0) #set($n = $names.get($i)) #set($title = $doc.title) #if(($n.startsWith("O-") && $title.startsWith("O-")) || ($n.startsWith("P-") && $title.startsWith("P-"))) #if($doc.title != $n) #set($spaceName = $doc.title) #else #set($spaceName = $n) #end #else #set($i = $i - 1) #getOrgOrPro($names, $i) #end #end #end #macro(getName $doc $spaceName) #customSplit ($doc.fullName, $names) #set($i = $names.size() - 1) #getOrgOrPro($names, $i, $spaceName) #end #set($userIndexRef = $services.model.createDocumentReference('', 'Main', 'UserDirectory')) {{html clean="false"}}
